mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `order` WHERE DATE(created_at) = DATE('now')
SELECT SUM(total_price) FROM `order` WHERE STRFTIME('%Y-%m', created_at) = STRFTIME('%Y-%m', 'now') AND `status` IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT DATE(created_at) as date, SUM(total_price) as sales FROM `order` WHERE DATE(created_at) >= DATE('now', '-6 days') AND `status` IN (1, 2, 3) GROUP BY DATE(created_at) ORDER BY date ASC

SELECT c.name as categoryName, SUM(oi.quantity * b.price) as sales FROM order_item oi LEFT JOIN book b ON oi.book_id = b.id LEFT JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN `order` o ON oi.order_id = o.id WHERE o.`status` IN (1, 2, 3) GROUP BY c.id, c.name ORDER BY sales DESC
